questions.ask_is_power_light_on: Is the power light on the PC lit up?
questions.ask_is_plugged_in: Is the PC firmly plugged into a wall outlet?
questions.ask_do_you_hear_fan: When you press the power button, do you hear any fans spinning?
questions.ask_have_you_restarted: Have you tried restarting the computer recently?

suggestions.suggestion_plug_in_power_cable: Please plug in the power cable to a wall outlet and try again.
suggestions.suggestion_check_power_outlet: The PC seems to be plugged in. Please try a different power outlet or check if the outlet is working.
suggestions.suggestion_possible_power_supply_failure: It's possible there is a power supply unit (PSU) failure.
suggestions.suggestion_check_monitor_cable: The PC seems to have power. Please check if the monitor cable is securely connected to both the PC and the monitor.
suggestions.suggestion_restart_the_pc: Often, a simple restart can solve performance issues. Please restart your PC.
suggestions.suggestion_check_task_manager_for_high_c: Please open the Task Manager (Ctrl+Shift+Esc) and check for any applications using a high percentage of the CPU.
